title: The Story of One Continent - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life
author: Sigsawa Keiichi   時雨沢恵一
description:
The Story of One Continent is one final send-off for the long-running series of novels by Keiichi Sigsawa that includes Allison, Lillia and Treize, and Meg and Seron.

As this is a sequel that involves characters from all three series, you are advised to read all of Allison, Lillia and Treize, and Meg and Seron before diving in.>
